You should update!

The 2021 survey of the OSM community is active! Take part here until 14 February. 15 languages are available.

News

  • 2020-12-29 (stable version 17428)
  • 2020-11-22 (stable version 17329)
    • Re-organize the preference dialog
    • New macOS bundle system, with Retina resolution, built-in Java runtime, and valid Apple software notarisation (no more scary warnings when opening!)
  • 2020-10-05 (stable version 17084)
    • Various minor enhancements, see Changelog
  • 2020-09-07 (stable version 17013)
    • New language Serbian with Latin script
    • Display GPX routes as separate layer (like markers)
    • Improved HiDPI support since all JOSM core icons are available as SVG
    • Dark mode available via the new plugin FlatLaf
  • More news ...
  • Active version '16812 Debian' should be updated! The current stable snapshot is 17428 and 17484 is the unstable development version.
  • Help translating JOSM into your language! Currently 100% of program texts are done.

Getting Started

  • Download some existing data from OSM using Download data on the File menu or the download button . If you have questions during your very first edit, the Introduction page will assist you.

Getting Help

  • Online help: Help on the Help menu or press F1 as required to get context sensitive help. Open Help now.
  • Join the forum or ask at help.openstreetmap.org

Remember the golden rules of OpenStreetMap:

  • Don't copy from other maps
  • Have fun!
